page.title: 20SCHOOL CUSTOMS
page.content: EACH SCHOOL HOUSE HAS A PARTY EVERY YEAR.THE FOURTH FORM CHOOSE A THEME, SUCH AS HORROR OR COUPLES.EVERYONE HAS TO DRESS UP AND THERE ARE PRIZES FOR THE BEST COSTUMES,AND GAMES ARE PLAYED.WE HAVE A SPECIAL MEAL COOKED BY THE FIFTH FORM.EVERY CHRISTMAS TERM WE HAVE A CHRISTMAS LUNCH AND A FANCY DRESS PARTY, ORGANISED BY THE FIFTH FORM.WE HAVE CAROL CONCERTS IN THE ABBOTS HALL,AND A CHRISTMAS TREE. EVERY TERM THERE ARE INTER-HOUSE GAMES.THERE ARE ALSO MIDNIGHT FEASTS WHICH WE CALL MIFFIES. SCHOOL PREFECTS ARE CALLED STARS OR BRONZES.THESE ARE FIFTH OR SIXTH FORMERS AND WE HAVE TO REPORT GOOD AND BAD MARKS TO THEM.FOR GOOD CONDUCT, THE JUNIORS CAN WIN A GOOD CONDUCT RIBBON AND THE SENIORS A HOUSE SHIELD. WE CAN ALSO WIN GAMES BADGES & RIBBONS AND DEPORTMENT BADGES.
